Expansion.name: getUserPresetList
Expansion.description: Returns a list of all available user presets in the expansion.

Expansion.name: getWildcardReference
Expansion.description: Returns a valid wildcard reference ((`{EXP::Name}relativePath`) for the expansion.

Expansion.name: loadDataFile
Expansion.description: Attempts to parse a JSON file in the AdditionalSourceCode directory of the expansion.

Expansion.name: rebuildUserPresets
Expansion.description: Reextracts (and overrides) the user presets from the given expansion. Only works with intermediate / encrypted expansions.

Expansion.name: setAllowDuplicateSamples
Expansion.description: Sets whether the samples are allowed to be duplicated for this expansion. Set this to false if you operate on the same samples differently.

Expansion.name: setSampleFolder
Expansion.description: Changes the sample folder of that particular expansion.

Expansion.name: unloadExpansion
Expansion.description: Unloads this expansion so it will not show up in the list of expansions until the next restart.

Expansion.name: writeDataFile
Expansion.description: Writes the given data into the file in the AdditionalSourceCode directory of the expansion.

ExpansionHandler.name: encodeWithCredentials
getCurrentExpansion
ExpansionHandler.description: Returns the currently active expansion (if there is one).

ExpansionHandler.name: getExpansion
ExpansionHandler.description: Returns the expansion with the given name

ExpansionHandler.name: getExpansionForInstallPackage
ExpansionHandler.description: Checks if the expansion is already installed and returns a reference to the expansion if it exists.

ExpansionHandler.name: getExpansionList
ExpansionHandler.description: Returns a list of all available expansions.

ExpansionHandler.name: getMetaDataFromPackage
ExpansionHandler.description: Returns a meta data object from the .hr file

ExpansionHandler.name: getUninitialisedExpansions
ExpansionHandler.description: Returns a list of all expansions that aren't loaded properly yet.

ExpansionHandler.name: installExpansionFromPackage
ExpansionHandler.description: Decompresses the samples and installs the .hxi / .hxp file.

ExpansionHandler.name: refreshExpansions
ExpansionHandler.description: Call this to refresh the expansion list.

ExpansionHandler.name: setAllowedExpansionTypes
ExpansionHandler.description: Sets a list of allowed expansion types that can be loaded.

ExpansionHandler.name: setCredentials
ExpansionHandler.description: Set a credentials object that can be embedded into each expansion.

ExpansionHandler.name: setCurrentExpansion
ExpansionHandler.description: Sets the current expansion as active expansion.

ExpansionHandler.name: setEncryptionKey
ExpansionHandler.description: Set a encryption key that will be used to encrypt the content (deprecated).

ExpansionHandler.name: setErrorFunction
ExpansionHandler.description: Sets a error function that will be executed.

ExpansionHandler.name: setErrorMessage
ExpansionHandler.description: Calls the error function specified with setErrorFunction.

ExpansionHandler.name: setExpansionCallback
ExpansionHandler.description: Set a function that will be called whenever a expansion is being loaded.

ExpansionHandler.name: setInstallCallback
ExpansionHandler.description: Set a function that will be called during installation of a new expansion.

ExpansionHandler.name: setInstallFullDynamics
ExpansionHandler.description: Sets whether the installExpansionFromPackage function should install full dynamics.

FFT.name: getSpectrum2DParameters
FFT.description: Returns the JSON data for the spectrum parameters.

FFT.name: prepare
FFT.description: Allocates the buffers required for processing.

FFT.name: process
FFT.description: Process the given data (either a buffer or a array of buffers.

FFT.name: setEnableInverseFFT
FFT.description: This enables the inverse transform that will reconstruct the signal from the processed FFT.

FFT.name: setEnableSpectrum2D
FFT.description: Enables the creation of a 2D spectrograph image.

FFT.name: setMagnitudeFunction
FFT.description: Sets a function that will be executed with the amplitude information of the FFT bins.

FFT.name: setOverlap
FFT.description: Sets an overlap (from 0...1) for the chunks.

FFT.name: setPhaseFunction
FFT.description: Sets a function that will be executed with the phase information of the FFT bins.

FFT.name: setSpectrum2DParameters
FFT.description: Sets the spectrum data from the JSON object.

FFT.name: setUseFallbackEngine
FFT.description: This forces the FFT object to use the fallback engine.

FFT.name: setUseSpectrumList
FFT.description: Flushes the given spectrum list to a file.

FFT.name: setWindowType
FFT.description: Sets a window function that will be applied to the data chunks before processing.

File.name: copy
File.description: Copies the file. The target isn't the directory to put it in, it's the actual file to create.

File.name: copyDirectory
File.description: Recursively copies the directory. The target is the actual directory to create, not the directory into which the new one should be placed.

File.name: createDirectory
File.description: Returns the new directory created at the file location, if directory doesn't already exist

File.name: deleteFileOrDirectory
File.description: Deletes the file or directory WITHOUT confirmation.

File.name: extractZipFile
File.description: Extracts the ZIP archive if this file is a .zip file.

File.name: getBytesFreeOnVolume
File.description: Returns the number of bytes free on the drive that this file lives on.

File.name: getChildFile
File.description: Returns a child file if this is a directory.

File.name: getHash
File.description: Reads a file and generates the hash of its contents.

File.name: getNonExistentSibling
File.description: Returns a sibling file that doesn't exist.

File.name: getNumZippedItems
File.description: Returns the number of items in the zip file.

File.name: getParentDirectory
File.description: Returns the parent directory as File.

File.name: getRedirectedFolder
File.description: If this file is a folder that contains a HISE redirection file (LinkWindows / LinkOSX file), then it will return the redirection target, otherwise it will return itself.

File.name: getRelativePathFrom
File.description: Returns a relative path from the given other file.

File.name: getSize
File.description: Returns the size of the file in bytes.

File.name: hasWriteAccess
File.description: true if it's possible to create and write to this file. If the file doesn't already exist, this will check its parent directory to see if writing is allowed.

File.name: isChildOf
File.description: Checks if this file is a child file of the other file.

File.name: isDirectory
File.description: Checks if this file exists and is a directory.

File.name: isFile
File.description: Checks if this file exists and is a file.

File.name: isSameFileAs
File.description: Checks if the file matches the other file (the object comparison might not work reliably).

File.name: loadAsAudioFile
File.description: Loads the given file as audio file.

File.name: loadAsBase64String
File.description: Loads the binary file, compresses it with zstd and returns a Base64 string.

File.name: loadAsMidiFile
File.description: Loads the track (zero-based) of the MIDI file. If successful, it returns an object containing the time signature and a list of all events.

File.name: loadAsObject
File.description: Loads the given file as object.

File.name: loadAsString
File.description: Loads the given file as text.

File.name: loadAudioMetadata
File.description: Tries to parse the metadata from the audio file (channel amount, length, samplerate, etc) and returns a JSON object if sucessful.

File.name: loadEncryptedObject
File.description: Loads the encrypted object using the supplied RSA key pair.

File.name: loadFromXmlFile
File.description: Loads the XML file and tries to parse it as JSON object.

File.name: loadMidiMetadata
File.description: Tries to parse the metadata of the MIDI file and returns a JSON object if successful.

File.name: move
File.description: Moves the file. The target isn't the directory to put it in, it's the actual file to create.

File.name: rename
File.description: Renames the file.

File.name: setExecutePermission
File.description: Changes the execute-permissions of a file.

File.name: setReadOnly
File.description: Changes the read/write permission for the given file.

File.name: show
File.description: Opens a Explorer / Finder window that points to the file.

File.name: startAsProcess
File.description: Launches the file as a process.

File.name: toReferenceString
File.description: Returns a reference string with a wildcard.

File.name: toString
File.description: Returns a String representation of that file.

File.name: writeAsXmlFile
File.description: Replaces the XML file with the JSON content (needs to be convertible).

File.name: writeAudioFile
File.description: Writes the given data (either a Buffer or Array of Buffers) to a audio file.

File.name: writeEncryptedObject
File.description: Encrypts an JSON object using the supplied key.

File.name: writeMidiFile
File.description: Writes the array of MessageHolders as MIDI file using the metadataObject to determine time signature, tempo, etc.

File.name: writeObject
File.description: Replaces the file content with the JSON data.

File.name: writeString
File.description: Replaces the file content with the given text.

FileSystem.name: browse
FileSystem.arguments: (var startFolder, bool forSaving, String wildcard, var callback)
FileSystem.description: Opens a file browser to choose a file.

FileSystem.name: browseForDirectory
FileSystem.description: Opens a file browser to choose a directory.

FileSystem.name: browseForMultipleDirectories
FileSystem.description: Opens a file browser to select multiple directories.

FileSystem.name: browseForMultipleFiles
FileSystem.description: Opens a file browser to select multiple files (to open).

FileSystem.name: decryptWithRSA
FileSystem.description: Decrypts the given string using a RSA public key.

FileSystem.name: descriptionOfSizeInBytes
FileSystem.description: Convert a file size in bytes to a neat string description.

FileSystem.name: encryptWithRSA
FileSystem.description: Encrypts the given string using a RSA private key.

FileSystem.name: findFiles
FileSystem.description: Returns a list of all child files of a directory that match the wildcard.

FileSystem.name: findFileSystemRoots
FileSystem.description: Returns a list of all root drives of the current computer.

FileSystem.name: fromAbsolutePath
FileSystem.description: Returns a file object from an absolute path (eg. C:/Windows/MyProgram.exe).

FileSystem.name: fromReferenceString
FileSystem.description: Returns a file object for the given location type and the reference string which can either contain a wildcard like `{PROJECT_FOLDER}` or a full file path.

FileSystem.name: getBytesFreeOnVolume
FileSystem.description: Returns the number of free bytes on the volume of a given folder.

FileSystem.name: getFolder
FileSystem.description: Returns the current sample folder as File object.

FileSystem.name: getSystemId
FileSystem.description: Returns a unique machine ID that can be used to identify the computer.

FileSystem.name: loadExampleAssets
FileSystem.description: Loads a bunch of dummy assets (audio files, MIDI files, filmstrips) for use in snippets & examples.

FixObjectArray.name: clear
FixObjectArray.description: Clears the array (resets all objects to their default.

FixObjectArray.name: contains
FixObjectArray.description: checks if the array contains the object.

FixObjectArray.name: copy
FixObjectArray.description: Copies the property from each element into a buffer (or array).

FixObjectArray.name: fill
FixObjectArray.description: Fills the array with the given object.

FixObjectArray.name: fromBase64
FixObjectArray.description: Restores an array from a previously exported state.

FixObjectArray.name: indexOf
FixObjectArray.description: Returns the index of the first element that matches the given object.

FixObjectArray.name: size
FixObjectArray.description: Returns the size of the array.

FixObjectArray.name: sort
FixObjectArray.description: Sorts the array with the given compare function.

FixObjectArray.name: toBase64
FixObjectArray.description: Exports the memory region of the entire array as Base64 encoded string.

FixObjectFactory.name: create
FixObjectFactory.description: Creates a single object from the prototype layout.

FixObjectFactory.name: createArray
FixObjectFactory.description: Creates a fixed size array with the given number of elements.

FixObjectFactory.name: getTypeHash
FixObjectFactory.description: Returns the hash code for the memory layout which factors in member IDs, order and type.

FixObjectFactory.name: setCompareFunction
FixObjectFactory.description: Registers a function that will be used for comparison. If you pass in a string it will only compare the given property.

FixObjectStack.name: clearQuick
FixObjectStack.description: Clears the stack by moving the end pointer to the start (leaving its elements in the same state).

FixObjectStack.name: contains
FixObjectStack.description: checks if the array contains the object.

FixObjectStack.name: copy
FixObjectStack.description: Copies the property from each element into a buffer (or array).

FixObjectStack.name: fill
FixObjectStack.description: Fills the array with the given object.

FixObjectStack.name: fromBase64
FixObjectStack.description: Restores an array from a previously exported state.

FixObjectStack.name: indexOf
FixObjectStack.description: Returns the index of the first element that matches the given object.

FixObjectStack.name: insert
FixObjectStack.description: Inserts a element to the stack.

FixObjectStack.name: isEmpty
FixObjectStack.description: Checks whether the stack is empty.

FixObjectStack.name: remove
FixObjectStack.description: Removes the element from the stack and fills up the gap.

FixObjectStack.name: removeElement
FixObjectStack.description: Removes the element at the given index and fills the gap.

FixObjectStack.name: set
FixObjectStack.description: Replaces the object if it exists or inserts it at the end.

FixObjectStack.name: size
FixObjectStack.description: Returns the number of used elements in the stack.

FixObjectStack.name: sort
FixObjectStack.description: Sorts the array with the given compare function.

FixObjectStack.name: toBase64
FixObjectStack.description: Exports the memory region of the entire array as Base64 encoded string.

GlobalCable.name: connectToGlobalModulator
GlobalCable.description: Connects the cable to a global LFO modulation output as source.

GlobalCable.name: connectToMacroControl
GlobalCable.description: Connects the cable to a macro control.

GlobalCable.name: connectToModuleParameter
GlobalCable.arguments: ( String processorId, var parameterIndexOrId, var targetObject)
GlobalCable.description: Connects the cable to a module parameter using a JSON object for defining the range.

GlobalCable.name: deregisterCallback
GlobalCable.description: Deregisteres a callback from the cable.

GlobalCable.name: getValue
GlobalCable.description: Returns the value (converted to the input range).

GlobalCable.name: registerCallback
GlobalCable.description: Registers a function that will be executed whenever a value is sent through the cable.

GlobalCable.name: registerDataCallback
GlobalCable.description: Registers a function that will be executed asynchronously when the data receives a JSON data chunk.

GlobalCable.name: sendData
GlobalCable.description: Sends any type of data (JSON, string, buffers) to the target.

GlobalCable.name: setRange
GlobalCable.description: Set the input range using a min and max value (no steps / no skew factor).

GlobalCable.name: setRangeWithSkew
GlobalCable.description: Set the input range using a min and max value and a mid point for skewing the range.

GlobalCable.name: setRangeWithStep
GlobalCable.description: Set the input range using a min and max value as well as a step size.

GlobalCable.name: setValue
GlobalCable.description: Sends the value to all targets (after converting it from the input range.

GlobalCable.name: setValueNormalised
GlobalCable.description: Sends the normalised value to all targets.

GlobalRoutingManager.name: addOSCCallback
GlobalRoutingManager.description: Register a scripting callback to be executed when a OSC message that matches the subAddress is received.

GlobalRoutingManager.name: connectToOSC
GlobalRoutingManager.description: Allows the global routing manager to send and receive OSC messages through the cables.

GlobalRoutingManager.name: getCable
GlobalRoutingManager.description: Returns a scripted reference to the global cable (and creates a cable with this ID if it can't be found.

GlobalRoutingManager.name: getEventData
GlobalRoutingManager.description: Returns the double value that is written to the data slot using setEventData. If the event ID wasn't written, it will return undefined.

GlobalRoutingManager.name: removeOSCCallback
GlobalRoutingManager.description: Removes a OSC callback for the given address.

GlobalRoutingManager.name: sendOSCMessage
GlobalRoutingManager.description: Send an OSC message to the output port.

GlobalRoutingManager.name: setEventData
GlobalRoutingManager.description: Writes a value into the given slot that can be retrieved using the event ID.

Graphics.name: addDropShadowFromAlpha
Graphics.description: Adds a drop shadow based on the alpha values of the current image.

Graphics.name: addNoise
Graphics.description: Adds noise to the current layer.

Graphics.name: applyGamma
Graphics.description: Applies a gamma correction to the current layer.

Graphics.name: applyGradientMap
Graphics.description: Applies a gradient map to the brightness level of the current layer.

Graphics.name: applyHSL
Graphics.description: Applies a HSL grading on the current layer.

Graphics.name: applyMask
Graphics.description: Applies a mask to the current layer.

Graphics.name: applySepia
Graphics.description: Applies an oldschool sepia filter on the current layer.

Graphics.name: applyShader
Graphics.description: Applies an OpenGL shader to the panel. Returns false if the shader could not be compiled.

Graphics.name: applySharpness
Graphics.description: Applies a sharpen / soften filter on the current layer.

Graphics.name: applyVignette
Graphics.description: Applies a vignette (dark corners on the current layer.

Graphics.name: beginBlendLayer
Graphics.description: Begins a new layer that will use the given blend effect.

Graphics.name: beginLayer
Graphics.description: Starts a new Layer.

Graphics.name: boxBlur
Graphics.description: Applies a box blur to the current layer.

Graphics.name: desaturate
Graphics.description: Removes all colour from the current layer.

Graphics.name: drawAlignedText
Graphics.description: Draws a text with the given alignment (see the Label alignment property).

Graphics.name: drawAlignedTextShadow
Graphics.arguments: (String text, var area, String alignment, var shadowData)
Graphics.description: Renders a (blurred) shadow for the text.

Graphics.name: drawDropShadow
Graphics.description: Draws a drop shadow around a rectangle.

Graphics.name: drawDropShadowFromPath
Graphics.arguments: (var path, var area, var colour, int radius, var offset)
Graphics.description: Draws a drop shadow from a path using melatonin blur.

Graphics.name: drawEllipse
Graphics.description: Draws a ellipse in the given area.

Graphics.name: drawFFTSpectrum
Graphics.description: Draws the spectrum of the FFT object to the panel.

Graphics.name: drawFittedText
Graphics.arguments: (String text, var area, String alignment, int maxLines, float scale)
Graphics.description: Tries to draw a text string inside a given space.

Graphics.name: drawHorizontalLine
Graphics.description: Draws a (non interpolated) horizontal line.

Graphics.name: drawImage
Graphics.arguments: (String imageName, var area, int xOffset, int yOffset)
Graphics.description: Draws a image into the area.

Graphics.name: drawInnerShadowFromPath
Graphics.arguments: (var path, var area, var colour, int radius, var offset)
Graphics.description: Draws an inner shadow for the given path using melatonin blur.

Graphics.name: drawLine
Graphics.arguments: (float x1, float x2, float y1, float y2, float lineThickness)
Graphics.description: Draws a line.

Graphics.name: drawMarkdownText
Graphics.description: Draws the text of the given markdown renderer to its specified area.

Graphics.name: drawMultiLineText
Graphics.arguments: (String text, var xy, int maxWidth, String alignment, float leading)
Graphics.description: Break to new lines when the text becomes wider than maxWidth.

Graphics.name: drawPath
Graphics.description: Draws the given path.

Graphics.name: drawRect
Graphics.description: Draws a rectangle.

Graphics.name: drawRepaintMarker
Graphics.description: fills the entire component with a random colour to indicate a UI repaint.

Graphics.name: drawRoundedRectangle
Graphics.description: Draws a rounded rectangle. cornerData can be either a float number (for the corner size) or a JSON object for more customization options.

Graphics.name: drawSVG
Graphics.description: Draws a SVG object within the given bounds and opacity.

Graphics.name: drawText
Graphics.description: Draws a centered and vertically stretched text.

Graphics.name: drawTriangle
Graphics.description: Draws a triangle rotated by the angle in radians.

Graphics.name: drawVerticalLine
Graphics.description: Draws a (non interpolated) vertical line.

Graphics.name: endLayer
Graphics.description: flushes the current layer.

Graphics.name: fillAll
Graphics.description: Fills the whole area with the given colour.

Graphics.name: fillEllipse
Graphics.description: Fills a ellipse in the given area.

Graphics.name: fillPath
Graphics.description: Fills a Path.

Graphics.name: fillRect
Graphics.description: Fills a rectangle with the given colour.

Graphics.name: fillRoundedRectangle
Graphics.description: Fills a rounded rectangle. cornerData can be either a float number (for the corner size) or a JSON object for more customization options.

Graphics.name: fillTriangle
Graphics.description: Fills a triangle rotated by the angle in radians.

Graphics.name: flip
Graphics.description: Flips the canvas at the center.

Graphics.name: gaussianBlur
Graphics.description: Applies gaussian blur to the current layer.

Graphics.name: getStringWidth
Graphics.description: Returns the width of the string using the current font.

Graphics.name: rotate
Graphics.description: Rotates the canvas around center `[x, y]` by the given amount in radian.

Graphics.name: setColour
Graphics.description: Sets the current colour.

Graphics.name: setFont
Graphics.description: Sets the current font.

Graphics.name: setFontWithSpacing
Graphics.description: Sets the current font with the specified spacing between the characters.

Graphics.name: setGradientFill
Graphics.description: Sets the current gradient via an array [Colour1, x1, y1, Colour2, x2, y2]

Graphics.name: setOpacity
Graphics.description: Sets a global transparency level.

LorisManager.name: createEnvelopePaths
LorisManager.description: Creates a list of path of every channel from the envelope of the given parameter and harmonic index.

LorisManager.name: createEnvelopes
LorisManager.description: Creates an audio rate envelope from the given parameter and harmonic index.

LorisManager.name: createSnapshot
LorisManager.description: Creates a parameter value list for each harmonic at the given time.

LorisManager.name: get
LorisManager.description: Returns the setting value for the Loris algorithm.

LorisManager.name: process
LorisManager.description: Processes the partial list using predefined commands.

LorisManager.name: processCustom
LorisManager.description: Processes the partial list using the given function.

LorisManager.name: set
LorisManager.description: set a option for the Loris algorithm.

LorisManager.name: synthesise
LorisManager.description: Resynthesise the file from the partial lists. Returns an array of variant buffers.

MacroHandler.name: getMacroDataObject
MacroHandler.description: Returns an object that contains the macro connection data.

MacroHandler.name: setExclusiveMode
MacroHandler.description: Enables the "exclusive" mode for MIDI automation (only one active parameter for each controller).

MacroHandler.name: setMacroDataFromObject
MacroHandler.description: Rebuilds the macro connections from the JSON object.

MacroHandler.name: setUpdateCallback
MacroHandler.description: Set a callback to be notified when a macro connection changes.

MarkdownRenderer.name: setImageProvider
MarkdownRenderer.description: Creates an image provider from the given JSON data that resolves image links.

MarkdownRenderer.name: setStyleData
MarkdownRenderer.description: Sets the style data for the markdown renderer.

MarkdownRenderer.name: setText
MarkdownRenderer.description: Set the markdown text to be displayed.

MarkdownRenderer.name: setTextBounds
MarkdownRenderer.description: Parses the text for the specified area and returns the used height (might be more or less than the height of the area passed in).

Math.name: fmod
Math.description: Returns the remainder when dividing value with limit.

Math.name: from0To1
Math.description: Converts a normalised value (between 0 and 1) to a range defined by the JSON data in rangeObj.

Math.name: isnan
Math.description: Checks for NaN (invalid floating point value).

Math.name: log
Math.description: Calculates the log value (with base E).

Math.name: pow
Math.description: Calculates the power of base and exponent.

Math.name: randInt
Math.description: Returns a random integer between the low and the high values.

Math.name: random
Math.description: Returns a random number between 0.0 and 1.0.

Math.name: range
Math.description: Limits the value to the given range.

Math.name: round
Math.description: Rounds the value to the next integer.

Math.name: sanitize
Math.description: Sets infinity & NaN floating point numbers to zero.

Math.name: sign
Math.description: Returns the sign of the value.

Math.name: skew
Math.description: Returns the skew factor for the given mid point.

Math.name: smoothstep
Math.description: Calculates a smooth transition between the lower and the upper value.

Math.name: sqr
Math.description: Calculates the square (x*x) of the value.

Math.name: sqrt
Math.description: Calculates the square root of the value.

Math.name: to0To1
Math.description: Converts a value inside a range defined by the JSON data in range obj to a normalised value.

Math.name: wrap
Math.description: Wraps the value around the limit (always positive).

Message.name: delayEvent
Message.description: Delays the event by the sampleAmount.

Message.name: getChannel
Message.description: Returns the MIDI Channel from 1 to 16.

Message.name: getCoarseDetune
Message.description: Returns the coarse detune amount in semitones.

Message.name: getControllerNumber
Message.description: returns the controller number or 'undefined', if the message is neither controller nor pitch wheel nor aftertouch.

Message.name: getControllerValue
Message.description: Returns the value of the controller.

Message.name: getEventId
Message.description: Returns the event id of the current message.

Message.name: getFineDetune
Message.description: Returns the fine detune amount int cents.

Message.name: getGain
Message.description: Returns the volume of the note.

Message.name: getMonophonicAftertouchPressure
Message.description: Returns the aftertouch value of the monophonic aftertouch message.

Message.name: getNoteNumber
Message.description: Return the note number. This can be called only on midi event callbacks.

Message.name: getPolyAfterTouchNoteNumber
Message.description: Returns the polyphonic aftertouch note number.

Message.name: getPolyAfterTouchPressureValue
Message.description: Checks if the message is a POLYPHONIC aftertouch message (Use isChannelPressure() for monophonic aftertouch).

Message.name: getProgramChangeNumber
Message.description: Returns the program change number or -1 if it isn't a program change message.

Message.name: getTimestamp
Message.description: Returns the timestamp of the message.

Message.name: getTransposeAmount
Message.description: Gets the tranpose value.

Message.name: getVelocity
Message.description: Returns the Velocity.

Message.name: ignoreEvent
Message.description: Ignores the event.

Message.name: isArtificial
Message.description: Checks if the event was created by a script earlier.

Message.name: isMonophonicAfterTouch
Message.description: Checks if the message is a MONOPHONIC aftertouch message.

Message.name: isPolyAftertouch
Message.description: Checks if the message is a POLYPHONIC aftertouch message (Use isChannelPressure() for monophonic aftertouch).

Message.name: isProgramChange
Message.description: Checks if the message is a program change message.

Message.name: makeArtificial
Message.description: Creates a artificial copy of this event and returns the new event ID. If the event is already artificial it will return the event ID.

Message.name: makeArtificialOrLocal
Message.description: Creates a artificial copy of this event and returns the new event ID. If the event is artificial it will make a new one with a new ID.

Message.name: sendToMidiOut
Message.description: This will forward the message to the MIDI out of the plugin.

Message.name: setAllNotesOffCallback
Message.description: Sets a callback that will be performed when an all notes off message is received.

Message.name: setChannel
Message.description: Changes the MIDI channel from 1 to 16.

Message.name: setCoarseDetune
Message.description: Sets the coarse detune amount in semitones.

Message.name: setControllerNumber
Message.description: Changes the ControllerNumber.

Message.name: setControllerValue
Message.description: Changes the controller value (range 0 - 127).

Message.name: setFineDetune
Message.description: Sets the fine detune amount in cents.

Message.name: setGain
Message.description: Sets the volume of the note (-100 = silence).

Message.name: setMonophonicAfterTouchPressure
Message.description: Sets the pressure value of the monophonic aftertouch message

Message.name: setNoteNumber
Message.description: Changes the note number.

Message.name: setPolyAfterTouchNoteNumberAndPressureValue
Message.description: Copied from MidiMessage.

Message.name: setStartOffset
Message.description: Sets the start offset for the given message.

Message.name: setTransposeAmount
Message.description: Transposes the note on.

Message.name: setVelocity
Message.description: Changes the velocity (range 1 - 127).

Message.name: store
Message.description: Stores a copy of the current event into the given holder object.

MessageHolder.name: addToTimestamp
MessageHolder.description: Adds the given sample amount to the current timestamp.

MessageHolder.name: clone
MessageHolder.description: Returns a copy of this message holder object.

MessageHolder.name: dump
MessageHolder.description: Creates a info string for debugging.

MessageHolder.name: getChannel
MessageHolder.description: Returns the MIDI Channel from 1 to 16.

MessageHolder.name: getCoarseDetune
MessageHolder.description: Returns the coarse detune amount in semitones.

MessageHolder.name: getControllerNumber
MessageHolder.description: returns the controller number or 'undefined', if the message is neither controller nor pitch wheel nor aftertouch.

MessageHolder.name: getControllerValue
MessageHolder.description: Returns the value of the controller.

MessageHolder.name: getEventId
MessageHolder.description: Returns the event id of the current message.

MessageHolder.name: getFineDetune
MessageHolder.description: Returns the fine detune amount int cents.

MessageHolder.name: getGain
MessageHolder.description: Returns the volume of the note.

MessageHolder.name: getMonophonicAftertouchPressure
MessageHolder.description: Returns the aftertouch value of the monophonic aftertouch message.

MessageHolder.name: getNoteNumber
MessageHolder.description: Return the note number. This can be called only on midi event callbacks.

MessageHolder.name: getPolyAfterTouchNoteNumber
MessageHolder.description: Returns the polyphonic aftertouch note number.

MessageHolder.name: getPolyAfterTouchPressureValue
MessageHolder.description: Checks if the message is a POLYPHONIC aftertouch message (Use isChannelPressure() for monophonic aftertouch).

MessageHolder.name: getTimestamp
MessageHolder.description: Returns the current timestamp.

MessageHolder.name: getTransposeAmount
MessageHolder.description: Gets the tranpose value.

MessageHolder.name: getVelocity
MessageHolder.description: Returns the Velocity.

MessageHolder.name: ignoreEvent
MessageHolder.description: Ignores the event.

MessageHolder.name: isController
MessageHolder.description: Returns true if the event is a CC controller event.

MessageHolder.name: isMonophonicAfterTouch
MessageHolder.description: Checks if the message is a MONOPHONIC aftertouch message.

MessageHolder.name: isNoteOff
MessageHolder.description: Returns true if the event is a note-off event.

MessageHolder.name: isNoteOn
MessageHolder.description: Returns true if the event is a note-on event.

MessageHolder.name: isPolyAftertouch
MessageHolder.description: Checks if the message is a POLYPHONIC aftertouch message (Use isChannelPressure() for monophonic aftertouch).

MessageHolder.name: setChannel
MessageHolder.description: Changes the MIDI channel from 1 to 16.

MessageHolder.name: setCoarseDetune
MessageHolder.description: Sets the coarse detune amount in semitones.

MessageHolder.name: setControllerNumber
MessageHolder.description: Changes the ControllerNumber.

MessageHolder.name: setControllerValue
MessageHolder.description: Changes the controller value (range 0 - 127).

MessageHolder.name: setFineDetune
MessageHolder.description: Sets the fine detune amount in cents.

MessageHolder.name: setGain
MessageHolder.description: Sets the volume of the note (-100 = silence).

MessageHolder.name: setMonophonicAfterTouchPressure
MessageHolder.description: Sets the pressure value of the monophonic aftertouch message

MessageHolder.name: setNoteNumber
MessageHolder.description: Changes the note number.

MessageHolder.name: setPolyAfterTouchNoteNumberAndPressureValue
MessageHolder.description: Copied from MidiMessage.

MessageHolder.name: setStartOffset
MessageHolder.description: Sets the start offset.

MessageHolder.name: setTimestamp
MessageHolder.description: Sets the timestamp in samples.

MessageHolder.name: setTransposeAmount
MessageHolder.description: Transposes the note on.

MessageHolder.name: setType
MessageHolder.description: Sets the type of the event.

MessageHolder.name: setVelocity
MessageHolder.description: Changes the velocity (range 1 - 127).

MidiAutomationHandler.name: getAutomationDataObject
MidiAutomationHandler.description: Returns an object that contains the MIDI automation data.

MidiAutomationHandler.name: setAutomationDataFromObject
MidiAutomationHandler.description: Sets the MIDI automation from the automation data object.

MidiAutomationHandler.name: setConsumeAutomatedControllers
MidiAutomationHandler.description: Sets whether a automated MIDI CC message should be consumed by the automation handler (default is enabled).

MidiAutomationHandler.name: setControllerNumberNames
MidiAutomationHandler.description: Replaces the names in the popup.

MidiAutomationHandler.name: setControllerNumbersInPopup
MidiAutomationHandler.description: Sets the numbers that are displayed in the MIDI automation popup.

MidiAutomationHandler.name: setExclusiveMode
MidiAutomationHandler.description: Enables the "exclusive" mode for MIDI automation (only one active parameter for each controller).

MidiAutomationHandler.name: setUpdateCallback
MidiAutomationHandler.description: Set a function (with one parameter containing the automation data as JSON) that will be executed whenever the MIDI automation changes.

MidiList.name: fill
MidiList.description: Fills the MidiList with a number specified with valueToFill.

MidiList.name: getBase64String
MidiList.description: Encodes all values into a base64 encoded string for storage.

MidiList.name: getIndex
MidiList.description: Returns the first index that contains this value.

MidiList.name: getNumSetValues
MidiList.description: Returns the number of values that are not -1.

MidiList.name: getValue
MidiList.description: Returns the value at the given number.

MidiList.name: getValueAmount
MidiList.description: Returns the number of occurences of 'valueToCheck'

MidiList.name: isEmpty
MidiList.description: Checks if the list contains any data.

MidiList.name: restoreFromBase64String
MidiList.description: Restore the values from a String that was created with getBase64String().

MidiList.name: setRange
MidiList.description: Sets a range of items to the same value.

MidiList.name: setValue
MidiList.description: Sets the number to something between -127 and 128.

MidiPlayer.name: asMidiProcessor
MidiPlayer.description: Returns a typed MIDI processor reference (for setting attributes etc).

MidiPlayer.name: clearAllSequences
MidiPlayer.description: Removes all sequences and tracks.

MidiPlayer.name: connectToMetronome
MidiPlayer.description: Connects this MIDI player to the given metronome.

MidiPlayer.name: connectToPanel
MidiPlayer.description: Connect this to the panel and it will be automatically updated when something changes.

MidiPlayer.name: convertEventListToNoteRectangles
MidiPlayer.description: Converts a given array of Message holders to a rectangle list.

MidiPlayer.name: create
MidiPlayer.description: Creates an empty sequence with the given length.

MidiPlayer.name: flushMessageList
MidiPlayer.description: Writes the given array of MessageHolder objects into the current sequence. This is undoable.

MidiPlayer.name: flushMessageListToSequence
MidiPlayer.description: Writes the given array of MessageHolder objects into the sequence with the given (one-based!) index. This is undoable.

MidiPlayer.name: getEventList
MidiPlayer.description: Creates an array containing all MIDI messages wrapped into MessageHolders for processing.

MidiPlayer.name: getEventListFromSequence
MidiPlayer.description: Creates an array containing all MIDI messages from the sequence with the given (one-based!) index into Message Holders.

MidiPlayer.name: getLastPlayedNotePosition
MidiPlayer.description: Returns the position of the last played note.

MidiPlayer.name: getMidiFileList
MidiPlayer.description: Returns a list of all MIDI files that are embedded in the plugin.

MidiPlayer.name: getNoteRectangleList
MidiPlayer.description: Returns an array containing all notes converted to the space supplied with the target bounds [x, y, w, h].

MidiPlayer.name: getNumSequences
MidiPlayer.description: Returns the number of loaded sequences.

MidiPlayer.name: getNumTracks
MidiPlayer.description: Returns the number of tracks in the current sequence.

MidiPlayer.name: getPlaybackPosition
MidiPlayer.description: Returns the playback position in the current loop between 0.0 and 1.0.

MidiPlayer.name: getPlayState
MidiPlayer.description: Returns the play state (0 = stop, 1 = play, 2 = recording.

MidiPlayer.name: getTicksPerQuarter
MidiPlayer.description: Returns the tick resolution for a quarter note.

MidiPlayer.name: getTimeSignature
MidiPlayer.description: Returns an object with properties about the length of the current sequence.

MidiPlayer.name: getTimeSignatureFromSequence
MidiPlayer.description: Returns an object with properties about the length of the sequence with the given index.

MidiPlayer.name: isEmpty
MidiPlayer.description: Checks if the MIDI player contains a sequence to read / write.

MidiPlayer.name: isSequenceEmpty
MidiPlayer.description: Returns true if the sequence with the given (one-based!) index doesn't contain any midi data.

MidiPlayer.name: play
MidiPlayer.description: Starts playing. Use the timestamp to delay the event or use the currents event timestamp for sample accurate playback.

MidiPlayer.name: record
MidiPlayer.description: Starts recording (not yet implemented). Use the timestamp to delay the event or use the currents event timestamp for sample accurate playback.

MidiPlayer.name: redo
MidiPlayer.description: Redo the last edit.

MidiPlayer.name: reset
MidiPlayer.description: Resets the current sequence to the last loaded file.

MidiPlayer.name: saveAsMidiFile
MidiPlayer.description: Saves the current sequence into the given file at the track position.

MidiPlayer.name: setAutomationHandlerConsumesControllerEvents
MidiPlayer.description: This will send any CC messages from the MIDI file to the global MIDI handler.

MidiPlayer.name: setFile
MidiPlayer.description: Loads a MIDI file and switches to this sequence if specified.

MidiPlayer.name: setGlobalPlaybackRatio
MidiPlayer.description: Sets a global playback ratio (for all MIDI players).

MidiPlayer.name: setPlaybackCallback
MidiPlayer.description: Attaches a callback with two arguments (timestamp, playState) that gets executed when the play state changes.

MidiPlayer.name: setPlaybackPosition
MidiPlayer.description: Sets the playback position in the current loop. Input must be between 0.0 and 1.0.

MidiPlayer.name: setRecordEventCallback
MidiPlayer.description: Sets a inline function that will process every note that is about to be recorded.

MidiPlayer.name: setRepaintOnPositionChange
MidiPlayer.description: If true, the panel will get a repaint() call whenever the playback position changes.

MidiPlayer.name: setSequence
MidiPlayer.description: Enables the (previously loaded) sequence with the given (one-based!) index.

MidiPlayer.name: setSequenceCallback
MidiPlayer.description: Attaches a callback that gets executed whenever the sequence was changed.

MidiPlayer.name: setSyncToMasterClock
MidiPlayer.description: Syncs the playback of this MIDI player to the master clock (external or internal).

MidiPlayer.name: setTimeSignature
MidiPlayer.description: Sets the timing information of the current sequence using the given object.

MidiPlayer.name: setTimeSignatureToSequence
MidiPlayer.description: Sets the timing information of the sequence with the given index using the given object.

MidiPlayer.name: setTrack
MidiPlayer.description: Sets the track index (starting with one).

MidiPlayer.name: setUseGlobalUndoManager
MidiPlayer.description: If enabled, it uses the global undo manager for all edits (So you can use Engine.undo()).

MidiPlayer.name: setUseTimestampInTicks
MidiPlayer.description: Uses Ticks instead of samples when editing the MIDI data.

MidiPlayer.name: stop
MidiPlayer.description: Starts playing. Use the timestamp to delay the event or use the currents event timestamp for sample accurate playback.

MidiPlayer.name: undo
MidiPlayer.description: Undo the last edit.

MidiProcessor.name: asMidiPlayer
MidiProcessor.description: Returns a reference of type ScriptedMidiPlayer that can be used to control the playback.

MidiProcessor.name: exists
MidiProcessor.description: Checks if the Object exists and prints a error message on the console if not.

MidiProcessor.name: exportScriptControls
MidiProcessor.description: Export the control values (without the script).

MidiProcessor.name: exportState
MidiProcessor.description: Exports the state as base64 string.

MidiProcessor.name: getAttribute
MidiProcessor.description: Returns the attribute with the given index.

MidiProcessor.name: getAttributeId
MidiProcessor.description: Returns the ID of the attribute with the given index.

MidiProcessor.name: getAttributeIndex
MidiProcessor.description: Returns the index of the attribute with the given ID.

MidiProcessor.name: getId
MidiProcessor.description: Returns the ID of the MIDI Processor.

MidiProcessor.name: isBypassed
MidiProcessor.description: Checks if the MidiProcessor is bypassed.

MidiProcessor.name: restoreScriptControls
MidiProcessor.description: Restores the control values for scripts (without recompiling).

MidiProcessor.name: restoreState
MidiProcessor.description: Restores the state from a base64 string.

MidiProcessor.name: setAttribute
MidiProcessor.description: Sets the attribute of the MidiProcessor. If it is a script, then the index of the component is used.

Modulator.name: addGlobalModulator
Modulator.description: Adds a and connects a receiver modulator for the given global modulator.

Modulator.name: addModulator
Modulator.description: Adds a modulator to the given chain and returns a reference.

Modulator.name: addStaticGlobalModulator
Modulator.description: Adds and connects a receiving static time variant modulator for the given global modulator.

Modulator.name: asTableProcessor
Modulator.description: Returns a reference as table processor to modify the table or undefined if no table modulator.

Modulator.name: connectToGlobalModulator
Modulator.description: Connects a receive modulator to a global modulator.

Modulator.name: exists
Modulator.description: Checks if the Object exists and prints a error message on the console if not.

Modulator.name: exportScriptControls
Modulator.description: Export the control values (without the script).

Modulator.name: exportState
Modulator.description: Exports the state as base64 string.

Modulator.name: getAttribute
Modulator.description: Returns the attribute with the given index.

Modulator.name: getAttributeId
Modulator.description: Returns the ID of the attribute with the given index.

Modulator.name: getAttributeIndex
Modulator.description: Returns the index of the attribute with the given ID.

Modulator.name: getCurrentLevel
Modulator.description: Returns the current peak value of the modulator.

Modulator.name: getGlobalModulatorId
Modulator.description: Returns the id of the global modulation container and global modulator this modulator is connected to

Modulator.name: getId
Modulator.description: Returns the ID of the modulator.

Modulator.name: getIntensity
Modulator.description: Returns the intensity of the Modulator. Ranges: Gain: 0...1, Pitch: -12...12.

Modulator.name: getModulatorChain
Modulator.description: Returns the Modulator chain with the given index.

Modulator.name: getNumAttributes
Modulator.description: Returns the number of attributes.

Modulator.name: getType
Modulator.description: Returns the Type of the modulator.

Modulator.name: isBipolar
Modulator.description: Returns true if the modulator works in bipolar mode.

Modulator.name: isBypassed
Modulator.description: Checks if the modulator is bypassed.

Modulator.name: restoreScriptControls
Modulator.description: Restores the control values for scripts (without recompiling).

Modulator.name: restoreState
Modulator.description: Restores the state from a base64 string.

Modulator.name: setAttribute
Modulator.description: Sets the attribute of the Modulator. You can look up the specific parameter indexes in the manual.

Modulator.name: setBypassed
Modulator.description: Bypasses the Modulator.

Modulator.name: setIntensity
Modulator.description: Changes the Intensity of the Modulator. Ranges: Gain Mode 0 ... 1, PitchMode -12 ... 12.

Modulator.name: setIsBipolar
Modulator.description: Sets the modulator to a bipolar range (if applicable).

Modulator.name: setMatrixProperties
Modulator.description: Sets the data for the input & output ranges if this modulator is a MatrixModulator.

NetworkTest.name: addRuntimeFunction
NetworkTest.description: Sets a function that will be executed at the given time to simulate live user input.

NetworkTest.name: checkCompileHashCodes
NetworkTest.description: Checks whether the hash code of all compiled nodes match their network file.

NetworkTest.name: createAsciiDiff
NetworkTest.description: Creates a ASCII diff with 'X' as error when the datas don't match.

NetworkTest.name: createBufferContentAsAsciiArt
NetworkTest.description: Creates a string that vaguely represents the buffer data content.

NetworkTest.name: dumpNetworkAsXml
NetworkTest.description: Creates a XML representation of the current network.

NetworkTest.name: expectEquals
NetworkTest.description: Compares the two data types and returns a error message if they don't match.

NetworkTest.name: getDllInfo
NetworkTest.description: Returns an object containing the information about the project dll.

NetworkTest.name: getLastTestException
NetworkTest.description: Returns the exception that was caused by the last test run (or empty if fine).

NetworkTest.name: getListOfAllCompileableNodes
NetworkTest.description: Returns the list of all nodes that can be compiled.

NetworkTest.name: getListOfCompiledNodes
NetworkTest.description: Returns the list of all compiled nodes.

NetworkTest.name: runTest
NetworkTest.description: runs the test and returns the buffer.

NetworkTest.name: setProcessSpecs
NetworkTest.description: Set the processing specifications for the test run.

NetworkTest.name: setWaitingTime
NetworkTest.description: Sets a time to wait between calling prepare and processing the data.

NeuralNetwork.name: build
NeuralNetwork.description: Create a network using the given JSON for the layer setup.

NeuralNetwork.name: clearModel
NeuralNetwork.description: Destroys the model and allows rebuilding using a different layout JSON.

NeuralNetwork.name: connectToGlobalCables
NeuralNetwork.description: Connects the network to a input and output global cable.

NeuralNetwork.name: createModelJSONFromTextFile
NeuralNetwork.description: Helper function to create a JSON model definition from the Pytorch print(model) output.

NeuralNetwork.name: loadNAMModel
NeuralNetwork.description: Loads the model from a NAM file.

NeuralNetwork.name: loadOnnxModel
NeuralNetwork.description: Loads the ONNX runtime model for spectral analysis.

NeuralNetwork.name: loadPytorchModel
NeuralNetwork.description: Loads the model layout and weights from a Pytorch model JSON.

NeuralNetwork.name: loadTensorFlowModel
NeuralNetwork.description: Loads the model layout and weights from a tensorflow model JSON.

NeuralNetwork.name: loadWeights
NeuralNetwork.description: Loads the weights from the JSON object.

NeuralNetwork.name: process
NeuralNetwork.description: Runs inference on the given input and returns either a single float or a reference to the output buffer.

NeuralNetwork.name: processFFTSpectrum
NeuralNetwork.description: Processes the FFT spectrum and returns the output tensor as array of float numbers.

Node.name: connectTo
Node.description: Connects this node to the given parameter target. sourceInfo is either the parameter name (String) or output slot (integer).

Node.name: connectToBypass
Node.description: Connects the bypass button of this node to the given source info ("NodeId.ParameterId").

Node.name: get
Node.description: Returns a property of the node.

Node.name: getChildNodes
Node.description: Returns a list of child nodes if this node is a container.

Node.name: getIndexInParent
Node.description: Returns the index in the parent.

Node.name: getOrCreateParameter
Node.description: Returns a reference to a parameter or creates a parameter (if non existent and possible).

Node.name: isActive
Node.description: Checks if the node is inserted into the signal path.

Node.name: isBypassed
Node.description: Checks if the node is bypassed.

Node.name: reset
Node.description: Reset the node's internal state (eg. at voice start).

Node.name: set
Node.description: Sets the property of the node.

Node.name: setComplexDataIndex
Node.description: Sets the complex data type at the dataSlot to the given index and data (if embedded).

Node.name: setParent
Node.description: Inserts the node into the given parent container.

Parameter.name: addConnectionFrom
Parameter.description: Adds (and/or) returns a connection from the given data.

Parameter.name: getId
Parameter.description: Returns the name of the parameter.

Parameter.name: getRangeObject
Parameter.description: Returns the range properties as JSON object.

Parameter.name: setRangeFromObject
Parameter.description: Updates the parameter range from the given object.

Parameter.name: setValueAsync
Parameter.description: Sets the value immediately and stores it asynchronously.

Parameter.name: setValueSync
Parameter.description: Stores the value synchronously and calls the callback.

Path.name: addArc
Path.description: Adds an arc to the path.

Path.name: addArrow
Path.arguments: (var start, var end, var thickness, var headWidth, var headLength)
Path.description: Adds an arrow to the path from start [x, y] and end [x, y].

Path.name: addEllipse
Path.description: Adds an ellipse to the path.

Path.name: addPieSegment
Path.arguments: (var area, var fromRadians, var toRadians, var innerCircleProportionalSize)
Path.description: Adds a pie segment to the path.

Path.name: addPolygon
Path.arguments: (var center, var numSides, var radius, var angle)
Path.description: Adds a polygon to the path from the center [x, y].

Path.name: addQuadrilateral
Path.arguments: (var xy1, var xy2, var xy3, var xy4)
Path.description: Adds a addQuadrilateral to the path.

Path.name: addRectangle
Path.description: Adds a rectangle to the path.

Path.name: addRoundedRectangle
Path.description: Adds a rounded rectangle to the path.

Path.name: addRoundedRectangleCustomisable
Path.description: Adds a fully customisable rounded rectangle to the path. area[x,y,w,h], cornerSizeXY[x,y], boolCurves[bool,bool,bool,bool]

Path.name: addStar
Path.arguments: (var center, var numPoints, var innerRadius, var outerRadius, var angle)
Path.description: Adds a star to the path from the center [x, y].

Path.name: addTriangle
Path.description: Adds a triangle to the path.

Path.name: clear
Path.description: Clears the Path.

Path.name: closeSubPath
Path.description: Closes the Path.

Path.name: contains
Path.description: Checks whether a point lies within the path. This is only relevant for closed paths.

Path.name: createStrokedPath
Path.description: Creates a fillable path using the provided strokeData (with optional dot.

Path.name: cubicTo
Path.arguments: (var cxy1, var cxy2, var x, var y)
Path.description: Adds a cubic bezier curve with two sets of control point arrays [cx1,cy1] and [cx2,cy2], and the end point [x,y].

Path.name: fromString
Path.description: Restores a path that has been converted into a string.

Path.name: getBounds
Path.description: Returns the area ([x, y, width, height]) that the path is occupying with the scale factor applied.

Path.name: getIntersection
Path.description: Returns the point where a line ([x1, y1], [x2, y2]) intersects the path when appropriate. Returns false otherwise.

Path.name: getLength
Path.description: Returns the length of the path.

Path.name: getPointOnPath
Path.description: Returns the point at a certain distance along the path.

Path.name: getRatio
Path.description: Returns the size ratio W/H of the path.

Path.name: getYAt
Path.description: Returns the y coordinate of the first intersection at the given X position or undefined if no match.

Path.name: lineTo
Path.description: Adds a line to [x,y].

Path.name: loadFromData
Path.description: Loads a path from a data array.

Path.name: quadraticTo
Path.arguments: (var cx, var cy, var x, var y)
Path.description: Adds a quadratic bezier curve with the control point [cx,cy] and the end point [x,y].

Path.name: roundCorners
Path.description: Creates a version of this path where all sharp corners have been replaced by curves.

Path.name: scaleToFit
Path.arguments: (var x, var y, var width, var height, bool preserveProportions)
Path.description: Rescales the path to make it fit neatly into a given space. preserveProportions keeps the w/h ratio.

Path.name: setBounds
Path.description: Sets a (minimal) bounding box for the path.

Path.name: startNewSubPath
Path.description: Starts a new Path. It does not clear the path, so use 'clear()' if you want to start all over again.

Path.name: toBase64
Path.description: Creates a base64 encoded representation of the path.

Path.name: toString
Path.description: Creates a string representation of this path.

Rectangle.name: assign
Rectangle.description: Override this method and assign the new value to the given id.

Rectangle.name: constrainedWithin
Rectangle.description: Tries to fit this rectangle within a target area, returning the result.

Rectangle.name: contains
Rectangle.description: Returns true if this other rectangle is completely inside this one.

Rectangle.name: expanded
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle that is larger than this one by a given amount.

Rectangle.name: getIntersection
Rectangle.description: Returns the intersection of both rectangles (the largest rectangle that fits into both rectangles.

Rectangle.name: getUnion
Rectangle.description: Returns the smallest rectangle that contains both this one and the one passed-in.

Rectangle.name: intersects
Rectangle.description: Returns true if any part of another rectangle overlaps this one.

Rectangle.name: isEmpty
Rectangle.description: Returns true if the rectangle's width or height are zero or less.

Rectangle.name: reduced
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle that is smaller than this one by a given amount.

Rectangle.name: removeFromBottom
Rectangle.description: Removes a strip from the bottom of this rectangle, reducing this rectangle by the specified amount and returning the section that was removed.

Rectangle.name: removeFromLeft
Rectangle.description: Removes a strip from the left of this rectangle, reducing this rectangle by the specified amount and returning the section that was removed.

Rectangle.name: removeFromRight
Rectangle.description: Removes a strip from the right of this rectangle, reducing this rectangle by the specified amount and returning the section that was removed.

Rectangle.name: removeFromTop
Rectangle.description: Removes a strip from the top of this rectangle, reducing this rectangle by the specified amount and returning the section that was removed.

Rectangle.name: scaled
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle with the position and size being scaled by the given factors.

Rectangle.name: setCentre
Rectangle.description: Changes the position of the rectangle's centre (leaving its size unchanged).

Rectangle.name: setPosition
Rectangle.description: Changes the position of the rectangle's top-left corner (leaving its size unchanged).

Rectangle.name: setSize
Rectangle.description: Changes the rectangle's size, leaving the position of its top-left corner unchanged.

Rectangle.name: toArray
Rectangle.description: Returns a standard JS array with the position [x, y, w, h].

Rectangle.name: translated
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle which is the same as this one moved by a given amount.

Rectangle.name: withAspectRatioLike
Rectangle.description: Returns the biggest rectangle that fits in this rectangle using the aspect ratio of the other rectangle.

Rectangle.name: withBottom
Rectangle.description: Returns a new rectangle with a different bottom edge position, but the same top edge as this one.

Rectangle.name: withBottomY
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle which has the same size and x-position as this one, but whose bottom edge has the given position.

Rectangle.name: withCentre
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle with the same size as this one, but a new centre position.

Rectangle.name: withHeight
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle which has the same position and width as this one, but with a different height.

Rectangle.name: withLeft
Rectangle.description: Returns a new rectangle with a different x position, but the same right-hand edge as this one.

Rectangle.name: withRight
Rectangle.description: Returns a new rectangle with a different right-hand edge position, but the same left-hand edge as this one.

Rectangle.name: withSize
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle with the same top-left position as this one, but a new size.

Rectangle.name: withSizeKeepingCentre
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle with the same centre position as this one, but a new size.

Rectangle.name: withTrimmedBottom
Rectangle.description: Returns a version of this rectangle with the given amount removed from its bottom edge.

Rectangle.name: withTrimmedLeft
Rectangle.description: Returns a version of this rectangle with the given amount removed from its left-hand edge.

Rectangle.name: withTrimmedRight
Rectangle.description: Returns a version of this rectangle with the given amount removed from its right-hand edge.

Rectangle.name: withTrimmedTop
Rectangle.description: Returns a version of this rectangle with the given amount removed from its top edge.

Rectangle.name: withWidth
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle which has the same position and height as this one, but with a different width.

Rectangle.name: withX
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle which has the same size and y-position as this one, but with a different x-position.

Rectangle.name: withY
Rectangle.description: Returns a rectangle which has the same size and x-position as this one, but with a different y-position.

RoutingMatrix.name: addConnection
RoutingMatrix.description: adds a connection to the given channels.

RoutingMatrix.name: addSendConnection
RoutingMatrix.description: adds a send connection to the given channels.

RoutingMatrix.name: getDestinationChannelForSource
RoutingMatrix.description: Returns the output channel that is mapped to the given input channel (or -1).

RoutingMatrix.name: getNumDestinationChannels
RoutingMatrix.description: Gets the amount of destination channels.

RoutingMatrix.name: getNumSourceChannels
RoutingMatrix.description: Gets the amount of source channels.

RoutingMatrix.name: getSourceChannelsForDestination
RoutingMatrix.description: Returns one or multiple input channels that is mapped to the given output channel (or -1).

RoutingMatrix.name: getSourceGainValue
RoutingMatrix.description: Gets the current peak value of the given channelIndex.

RoutingMatrix.name: removeConnection
RoutingMatrix.description: Removes the connection from the given channels.

RoutingMatrix.name: setNumChannels
RoutingMatrix.description: Sets the amount of channels (if the matrix is resizeable).

Sample.name: deleteSample
Sample.description: Deletes the sample from the Sampler (not just this reference!).

Sample.name: get
getCustomProperties
Sample.description: Returns an object that can hold additional properties.

Sample.name: getId
Sample.description: Returns the ID of the property (use this with the setFromJSONMethod).

Sample.name: getRange
Sample.description: Returns the value range that the given property can have (eg. the loop end might not go beyond the sample end.

Sample.name: loadIntoBufferArray
Sample.description: Loads the sample into a array of buffers for analysis.

Sample.name: refersToSameSample
Sample.description: Checks if the otherSample object refers to the same sample as this.

Sample.name: replaceAudioFile
Sample.description: Writes the content of the audio data (array of buffers) into the audio file. This is undoable!.

Sample.name: setFromJSON
Sample.description: Sets the properties from a JSON object.

Sampler.name: clearSampleMap
Sampler.description: Clears the current samplemap.

Sampler.name: createListFromGUISelection
Sampler.description: Returns a list of the sounds selected in the samplemap.

Sampler.name: createListFromScriptSelection
Sampler.description: Returns a list of the sounds selected by the selectSounds() method.

Sampler.name: createSelection
Sampler.description: Returns an array with all samples that match this regex.

Sampler.name: createSelectionFromIndexes
Sampler.description: Returns an array with all samples from the index data (can be either int or array of int, -1 selects all.).

Sampler.name: createSelectionWithFilter
Sampler.description: Returns an array with all samples that match the filter function.

Sampler.name: enableRoundRobin
Sampler.description: Enables / Disables the automatic round robin group start logic (works only on samplers).

Sampler.name: getActiveRRGroup
Sampler.description: Returns the currently (single) active RR group.

Sampler.name: getActiveRRGroupForEventId
Sampler.description: Returns the RR group that is associated with the event ID.

Sampler.name: getAttribute
Sampler.description: Gets the attribute with the given index (use the constants for clearer code).

Sampler.name: getAttributeId
Sampler.description: Returns the ID of the attribute with the given index.

Sampler.name: getAttributeIndex
Sampler.description: Returns the index of the attribute with the given ID.

Sampler.name: getAudioWaveformContentAsBase64
Sampler.description: Converts the user preset data of a audio waveform to a base 64 samplemap.

Sampler.name: getComplexGroupManager
Sampler.description: Returns an object that can be used to control the complex group management of this sampler.

Sampler.name: getCurrentSampleMapId
Sampler.description: Returns the currently loaded sample map.

Sampler.name: getMicPositionName
Sampler.description: Returns the name of the channel with the given index (Multimic samples only.

Sampler.name: getNumActiveGroups
Sampler.description: Returns the number of currently active groups.

Sampler.name: getNumAttributes
Sampler.description: Returns the number of attributes.

Sampler.name: getNumMicPositions
Sampler.description: Returns the number of mic positions.

Sampler.name: getNumSelectedSounds
Sampler.description: Returns the amount of selected samples.

Sampler.name: getReleaseStartOptions
Sampler.description: Returns the current release start options as JSON object.

Sampler.name: getRRGroupsForMessage
Sampler.description: Returns the amount of actual RR groups for the notenumber and velocity

Sampler.name: getSampleMapAsBase64
Sampler.description: Returns a base64 compressed string containing the entire samplemap.

Sampler.name: getSampleMapList
Sampler.description: Returns an array with all available sample maps.

Sampler.name: getSoundProperty
Sampler.description: Returns the property of the sound with the specified index.

Sampler.name: getTimestretchOptions
Sampler.description: Returns the current timestretching options as JSON object.

Sampler.name: importSamples
Sampler.description: Loads a few samples in the current samplemap and returns a list of references to these samples.

Sampler.name: isMicPositionPurged
Sampler.description: Checks if the mic position is purged.

Sampler.name: isNoteNumberMapped
Sampler.description: Checks whether the note number is mapped to any samples.

Sampler.name: loadSampleForAnalysis
Sampler.description: Loads the content of the given sample into an array of VariantBuffers that can be used for analysis.

Sampler.name: loadSampleMap
Sampler.description: Loads a new samplemap into this sampler.

Sampler.name: loadSampleMapFromBase64
Sampler.description: Loads a base64 compressed string with the samplemap.

Sampler.name: loadSampleMapFromJSON
Sampler.description: Loads a samplemap from a list of JSON objects.

Sampler.name: loadSfzFile
Sampler.description: Loads an SFZ file into the sampler.

Sampler.name: parseSampleFile
Sampler.description: Creates a JSON object from the sample file that can be used with loadSampleMapFromJSON.

Sampler.name: purgeMicPosition
Sampler.description: Purges all samples of the given mic (Multimic samples only).

Sampler.name: purgeSampleSelection
Sampler.description: Purges the array of sampler sounds (and unpurges the rest).

Sampler.name: refreshInterface
Sampler.description: Refreshes the interface. Call this after you changed the properties.

Sampler.name: refreshRRMap
Sampler.description: Recalculates the RR Map. Call this at compile time if you want to use 'getRRGroupForMessage()'.

Sampler.name: saveCurrentSampleMap
Sampler.description: Saves (and loads) the current samplemap to the given path (which should be the same string as the ID).

Sampler.name: selectSounds
Sampler.description: Selects samples using the regex string as wildcard and the selectMode ("SELECT", "ADD", "SUBTRACT")

Sampler.name: setActiveGroup
Sampler.description: Enables the group with the given index (one-based). Works only with samplers and `enableRoundRobin(false)`.

Sampler.name: setActiveGroupForEventId
Sampler.description: Enables the group with the given index (one-based) for the given event ID. Works only with samplers and `enableRoundRobin(false)`.

Sampler.name: setAllowReleaseStart
Sampler.description: Enable / disables the release start feature for the given event.

Sampler.name: setAttribute
Sampler.description: Sets a attribute to the given value.

Sampler.name: setGUISelection
Sampler.description: Sets the currently selected samples on the interface to the given list.

Sampler.name: setMultiGroupIndex
Sampler.description: Enables the group with the given index (one-based). Allows multiple groups to be active.

Sampler.name: setMultiGroupIndexForEventId
Sampler.description: Enables the group with the given index (one-based) for the given event id. Allows multiple groups to be active.

Sampler.name: setReleaseStartOptions
Sampler.description: Sets the options for the release start behaviour.

Sampler.name: setRRGroupVolume
Sampler.description: Sets the volume of a particular group (use -1 for active group). Only works with disabled crossfade tables.

Sampler.name: setSortByRRGroup
Sampler.description: Enables a presorting of the sounds into RR groups. This might improve the performance at voice start if you have a lot of samples (> 20.000) in many RR groups.

Sampler.name: setSoundProperty
Sampler.description: Sets the property for the index within the selection.

Sampler.name: setSoundPropertyForAllSamples
Sampler.description: Sets the property for all samples of the sampler.

Sampler.name: setSoundPropertyForSelection
Sampler.description: Sets the property of the sampler sound for the selection.

Sampler.name: setTimestretchOptions
Sampler.description: Sets the timestretching options from a JSON object.

Sampler.name: setTimestretchRatio
Sampler.description: Sets the timestretch ratio for the sampler depending on its timestretch mode.

Sampler.name: setUseStaticMatrix
Sampler.description: Disables dynamic resizing when a sample map is loaded.

ScriptWebView.description: Updates the value from the processor connection. Call this method whenever the module state has changed and you want to refresh the knob value to show the current state.

Server.name: callWithGET
Server.description: Calls a sub URL and executes the callback when finished.

Server.name: callWithPOST
Server.description: Calls a sub URL with POST arguments and executes the callback when finished.

Server.name: cleanFinishedDownloads
Server.description: Removes all finished downloads from the list.

Server.name: downloadFile

Server.description: Downloads a file to the given target and returns a Download object.

Server.name: getPendingCalls
Server.description: Returns a list of all pending Calls.

Server.name: getPendingDownloads
Server.description: Returns a list of all pending Downloads.

Server.name: isEmailAddress
Server.description: Checks if given email address is valid - not fool proof.

Server.name: isOnline
Server.description: Returns true if the system is connected to the internet.

Server.name: resendLastCall
Server.description: Resends the last call to the Server (eg. in case that there was no internet connection).

Server.name: setBaseURL

Server.name: setEnforceTrailingSlash

Server.name: setHttpHeader

Server.name: setNumAllowedDownloads
Server.description: Sets the maximal number of parallel downloads.

Server.name: setServerCallback

Server.name: setTimeoutMessageString

Settings.name: clearMidiLearn

Settings.name: crashAndBurn

Settings.name: getCurrentVoiceMultiplier

Settings.name: getMidiInputDevices

Settings.name: getUserDesktopSize

Settings.name: getZoomLevel

Settings.name: isMidiChannelEnabled

Settings.name: isMidiInputEnabled

Settings.name: isOpenGLEnabled
Settings.description: Returns whether OpenGL is enabled or not. The return value might be out of sync with the actual state (after you changed this setting until the next reload).

Settings.name: setAudioDevice
Settings.description: Sets the current audio device

Settings.name: setAudioDeviceType
Settings.description: Sets the current audio device type

Settings.name: setBufferSize
Settings.description: Sets the buffer block size for the selected audio device.

Settings.name: setDiskMode
Settings.description: Sets the Streaming Mode (0 -> Fast-SSD, 1 -> Slow-HDD)

Settings.name: setEnableDebugMode
Settings.description: Enables or disables debug logging

Settings.name: setEnableOpenGL
Settings.description: Enable OpenGL. This setting will be applied the next time the interface is rebuild.

Settings.name: setOutputChannel

Settings.name: setSampleFolder

Settings.name: setSampleRate
Settings.description: Sets the output sample rate

Settings.name: setVoiceMultiplier

Settings.name: setZoomLevel
Settings.description: Changes the UI zoom (1.0 = 100%).

Settings.name: startPerfettoTracing

Settings.name: stopPerfettoTracing

Settings.name: toggleMidiChannel

Settings.name: toggleMidiInput
Settings.description: Enables or disables named MIDI input device.

SliderPackData.name: fromBase64

SlotFX.name: clear
SlotFX.description: Clears the slot (loads a unity gain module).

SlotFX.name: exists
SlotFX.description: Checks if the Object exists and prints a error message on the console if not.

SlotFX.name: getCurrentEffect

SlotFX.name: getCurrentEffectId
SlotFX.description: Returns the ID of the effect that is currently loaded.

SlotFX.name: getParameterProperties
SlotFX.description: Returns a JSON object containing all parameters with their range properties.

String.name: capitalize
String.description: Converts a string to start case (first letter of every word is uppercase).

String.name: charAt
String.description: Returns the character at the given index.

String.name: charCodeAt
String.description: Returns the character at the given position as ASCII number.

String.name: concat
String.description: Joins two or more strings, and returns a new joined strings.

String.name: contains
String.description: Checks if the string contains the given substring.

String.name: decrypt
String.description: Decrypt a string from Blowfish encryption.

String.name: encrypt
String.description: Encrypt a string using Blowfish encryption.

String.name: getIntValue
String.description: Attempts to parse the string as integer number.

String.name: getTrailingIntValue
String.description: Attempts to parse a integer number at the end of the string.

String.name: hash
String.description: Creates a unique hash from the string.

String.name: indexOf
String.description: Returns the position of the first found occurrence of a specified value in a string.

String.name: lastIndexOf
String.description: Returns the position of the last found occurrence of a specified value in a string.

String.name: replace
String.description: Returns a copy of the string and replaces all occurences of `a` with `b`.

String.name: split
String.description: Splits the string into an array with the given separator.

String.name: splitCamelCase
String.description: Splits the string at uppercase characters (so MyValue becomes ["My", "Value"].

String.name: substring
String.description: Returns the substring in the given range.

String.name: toLowerCase
String.description: Converts a string to lowercase letters.

String.name: toUpperCase
String.description: Converts a string to uppercase letters.

String.name: trim
String.description: Returns a copy of this string with any whitespace characters removed from the start and end.

Synth.name: addController
Synth.arguments: (int channel, int number, int value, int timeStampSamples)
Synth.description: Adds a controller to the buffer.

Synth.name: addEffect
Synth.arguments: ( String type,  String id, int index)
Synth.description: Adds a effect (index = -1 to append it at the end).

Synth.name: addMessageFromHolder
Synth.description: Adds the event from the given holder and returns a event id for note ons.

Synth.name: addModulator
Synth.description: Adds a Modulator to the synth's chain. If it already exists, it returns the index.

Synth.name: addNoteOff
Synth.description: Adds a note off to the buffer.

Synth.name: addNoteOn
Synth.arguments: (int channel, int noteNumber, int velocity, int timeStampSamples)
Synth.description: Adds a note on to the buffer.

Synth.name: addPitchFade
Synth.arguments: (int eventId, int fadeTimeMilliseconds, int targetCoarsePitch, int targetFinePitch)
Synth.description: Adds a pitch fade to the given event ID.

Synth.name: addToFront
Synth.description: Adds the interface to the Container's body (or the frontend interface if compiled)

Synth.name: addVolumeFade
Synth.description: Fades all voices with the given event id to the target volume (in decibels).

Synth.name: attachNote
Synth.description: Attaches an artificial note to be stopped when the original note is stopped.

Synth.name: createBuilder
Synth.description: Creates a Builder object that can be used to create the module tree.

Synth.name: deferCallbacks
Synth.description: Defers all callbacks to the message thread (midi callbacks become read-only).

Synth.name: getAllEffects
Synth.description: Returns an array of all effects that match the given regex.

Synth.name: getAllModulators
Synth.description: Returns an array of all modulators that match the given regex.

Synth.name: getAttribute
Synth.description: Returns the attribute of the parent synth.

Synth.name: getAudioSampleProcessor
Synth.description: Returns the child synth with the supplied name.

Synth.name: getChildSynth
Synth.description: Returns the child synth with the supplied name.

Synth.name: getChildSynthByIndex
Synth.description: Returns the child synth with the given index.

Synth.name: getDisplayBufferSource
Synth.description: Returns a reference to a processor that holds a display buffer.

Synth.description: Returns the Effect with the supplied name. Can only be called in onInit(). It looks also in all child processors.

Synth.name: getIdList

Synth.name: getMidiPlayer

Synth.description: Returns the MidiProcessor with the supplied name. Can not be the own name!

Synth.description: Returns the Modulator with the supplied name. Can be only called in onInit. It looks also in all child processors.

Synth.name: getModulatorIndex
Synth.description: Returns the index of the Modulator in the chain with the supplied chainId

Synth.name: getNumChildSynths
Synth.description: Returns the number of child synths. Works with SynthGroups and SynthChains.

Synth.name: getNumPressedKeys
Synth.description: Returns the number of pressed keys (!= the number of playing voices!).

Synth.name: getRoutingMatrix

Synth.name: getSampler
Synth.description: Returns the first sampler with the name name.

Synth.name: getSliderPackProcessor
